name: Remnants of the Past (karelessocelot)
description:
Help the main character reconnect with his past by using A and D to travel in time and W to both sync with overlapping timeframes (the images of him in the past) and pause the game. While in the pause menu, you can read notes that are unlocked by syncing and learn more about him and his past.

Audio can only be adjusted on the title screen. Please adjust it so the initial music is quieter than you want because some tracks are louder. Also, I am aware that the clock ticks do not sync up with the music.

Additional notes: For convenience if your keyboard happens to be broken you can also hit your mouse buttons (left click for a, scroll wheel for w, right click for d).
